How to Book Hotels with Almosafer?

Whatever you are looking for. 5 star hotels, 4 star hotels, cheap hotels, budget hotels (3 star hotels or below), hostels, apartments, beach hotels /honeymoon hotels. You may also find the best resorts, including 5 star resorts, family resorts, luxury resorts, or beach resorts, they are all available on 1 platform. Almosafer offers a good selection of filters and sorting options that can help you book hotel rooms that meets your needs. 

  • Simply, select the city and your preferred dates. 
  • Next, you will get a column to filter your search, including price range, rating, amenities, and property type. 
  • Check the extensive description of hotel rooms, accompanied by clear photos and a list of the provided facilities. 
  • Looking for hotels for honeymooners? You can highlight any facilities such as spas, wifi services, hotels with a swimming pool, hotel with private pool, sea view hotels, etc. 
  • Once you've picked your hotel room, click the «Book Now» button to finish your hotel reservation.

Frequently Asked Questions

Q. How can I apply for an installment plan online?

A. Once you are done with your hotel booking, enter your credit card details, select 'Pay in installments', and choose your preferred payment plan.

Q. Do prices include taxes?

A. All prices on Almosafer include taxes.

Q. Can I book my accommodation without paying upfront?

A. Yes, the ‘book now, pay later’ option allows you to reserve a hotel room and pay upon arrival. Not matter what category you choose, even if it’s among luxury hotel rooms.

Q. How do I know if my booking is confirmed?

A. Once you have completed your hotel room booking, you'll receive a confirmation email and voucher with your booking information. If you don’t receive the confirmation email, don't hesitate to contact our customer support team.

Q. Can I book a room for a few hours?

A. No, bookings are for one-night minimum stays only (no night booking available).

Q. Can I cancel my booking and get a refund?

A. In case of cancellation, the request will be reviewed by our team, and you will receive a refund within 4 working days.

Q. Can I book more than one room at once?

A. You can book up to 4 rooms in one accommodation with the same check-in date.

Q. How to find hotels near me?

A. You can search by your area, then choose to filter hotels by distance.
